name: Transamin 500mg injection
description: Tranexamic acid is used to prevent excessive bleeding during menstruation, dental procedure, and prostatectomy. Also used in the treatment of dysfunctional uterine bleeding, ante and postpartum hemorrhage, hereditary angioedema (a genetic condition that causes swelling in the body), epistaxis (nosebleed), and in thrombolytic overdose (therapy use to break or dissolve blood clots).
label: medicine
